snippet.title: The Chronicle: Game Play (Walk Through) SPOILER ALERT!
snippet.description:
Hey All, 

https://store.steampowered.com/app/2004520/The_Chronicle/

I thought it time to do a walk through of The Chronicle and explain some of my game design decisions. There is also a sneak peek of Chapter 2. SPOILER ALERT! This does spoiler the ending, but I leave a lot of the game play out of the video, so there is plenty of lore and story to find.
